name: The Mummy Demastered

files.setup: N/A:Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Mummy Demastered/Mummy.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL /NOGUI
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
